text: Musrikon az rui istehzo va tamasxur guftand: «Agar Alloh mexost, movu padaronamon ƣajr az Alloh hec cizero nameparastidem va on ciro harom kardaem, harom namekardem». Mardume ham, ki pes az onho ʙudand, cunin mekardand (va ʙo in guna ʙahonaho va harom gardonidani cizho maqsadason qaʙul nakardani haq ʙud, vale xudason medonistand, ki in dar nazdi Alloh huccat namesavad.) Bar pajomʙaron cuz taʙliƣi oskoro vazifai digare nest
